# Implementation Documentation

## Documents

### font-refactoring-summary.md
**Status:** Completed | **Created:** 2025-11-07

Summary of font configuration refactoring that removed hardcoded font paths and replaced them with configurable values from `fonts.yml`. Includes details on the new `font_config.py` module and migration of all components.

### smart-merge-implementation.md
**Status:** Completed | **Created:** 2025-11-07

Implementation details of the hierarchical font configuration system with smart merge capabilities. Covers font matching, manifest merging, and the three-tier configuration hierarchy (defaults → fonts.yml → publish.yml).

## Purpose

This directory contains summaries of completed implementations, providing technical details and outcomes of specific development efforts.
